Thank you all !

- Be in charge of recruitment of new employees: Setup and organize the examination qualification and skills of the candidate,interview schedule.
- Send feedback to successful or rejected candidates in professional manner.
- Administer booking of Meeting Rooms and LCD projectors.
- Prepare and maintain personnel files for employees.
- Follow up & update weekly training plan - in house training and out side training.
- Implement and tested new training system.
- Activities for employees: JobFairs , SportDay, Happy Birthday....

educations.activities:
-Participating in “The Voice Viet” Show_2013
-Participating in “Accounting talent ” 2010 held by Hung Vuong University Ho Chi Minh.
-Voluntary teacher for ethnic children in ConRoBang, KonTum province (7-8/2011).
-Voluntary teacher for ethnic children in Khanh Hoa province (8/2010).
-Visiting orphanages in Thu Duc Teenager Village (4/2010); old people in Thi Nghe Rest – House (12/2009); handicapped children in Thien Phuoc House, Cu Chi district (11/2009).
